title: Family dispute leads to murder
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 65-year-old man was beaten to death in Dadalla, Galle on Tuesday (5).
A family dispute has led to the murder and two suspects have been arrested in connection with this incident.
The body of the deceased has been placed at the Karapitiya Hospital morgue in Galle.
UN human rights office urges Sri Lanka to defuse tensions peacefully
